original_text: Seven steps went up to it. The entrance room to the yard was at the end of the passage. There were pictures of palm trees on the inside walls of the passage.
korean_text: 또 그리로 올라가는 일곱 층계가 있고 그 안에 현관이 있으며 또 이쪽 저쪽 문 벽 위에 종려나무를 새겼으며

sentences.original_text: Seven steps went up to it.
The entrance room to the yard
was at the end of the passage.
There were pictures of palm trees
on the inside walls of the passage.
